about.2: Come study with us and ACE your exam!
about.3: We are (XXX) an online-standardized testing tool providing practice and instructional content for grades 9 & 12 exams across Europe.
about.4: We are a teacher's outside the classroom best assistant, a parent's most reliable confidante, a student's year-round useful source of "hands-on" practice testing to math exams.
a0001: You are given the number 35,78. What does number 7 express?
a0004: Find X if the sum of the following expressions is 9: $$ \frac{ 8^{2} - x}{ \sqrt{9} } ;  \frac{14+ \sqrt{121} }{ \sqrt{25} }  $$
a0005: How many numbers does this value have? $$   2^{20}  *   5^{23}  $$
a0006: Find the side of the square, if its surface is: $$  16a^{2}cm^{2}  $$
a0008: 1 USD is converted to 0.8 EUR. How many USD can you buy with 40 EUR ?
a0009: What is the radius of e bicycle with a perimeter of $$  \frac{ \pi }{2} * m $$
a0010: If a straight line has an equation y = 3x+1, what is the value of x for which y=4 ?
a0011: What is the value of this expression: $$  13^{2}-3^{2}  $$
a0012: Which pair of numbers is the solution for this system: $$ \begin{cases} \displaylines{2x-y = 1 \\ 4x+5y=9} \end{cases}  $$
a0013: The solution of the inequation  x-1<-2 is  the set: 1 pikë
a0014: What is the angle between the hour hand and the minute hand if the hour hand points at 13:00 and the minute hand points to the 30th minute.
a0015: What is the fraction that represents this periodic number $$  0.\overline{1}  $$
a0016: When n=10, find the general limit of $$  x_{n} =  \frac{n}{n+1}  $$
a0017: For what value of K, the tangent at x=1 of the following parabola is paralel with y=x $$  y=x^2+Kx+1 $$
a0018: Graphically represent the area defined by the inequations in the same coordinate system $$  \begin{cases}  \displaylines{y  \geq   x^{2} \\ y \leq x}\end{cases}  $$
a0019: Train A returns to the station every 30 minutes. Train B returns to the station every 40 minutes. Trains A and B depart simultaneously from the station at 08:00 in the morning. What time will trains A and B meet again at the station together for the first time?
a0020: In 2009, Usain Bolt ran 100m in 9,58s establishing a new world record. A model for his speed, v=m/s, in time t seconds is given bellow. When Bolt reached his maximum speed, he ran with constant speed for the rest of the 100m. What is the distance he ran with constant speed? $$ v = 1 – 0,4 t^{2}  + 4,4t $$
a0021: For what values of x, we have f'(x)=f(x) if $$ f(x)=2 x^{2} + 3x $$
a0022: We are given a point M (2;3). What are the coordinates of the symmetric point, in the OY axis ?
a0023: At x=1, what is the angular coefficient of the tanget to the line with the equation: $$ y=2 x^{3}- x^{2}+6x-1 $$
a0024: Point (1;2) is in the circle with equation ?
a0026: The solution of the equateion 2 CosX + 1 = 0 for [0;180] is ?
a0027: A grass lawn has the shape of a square (ABCD) with sides 6m. A sheep is tied to point A with an inextensible rope, 3m long. Find what percentage, of the square footage, is grass plot that the sheep can eat.
person.name: Name
